name: Ruff City
description:
Sit down, roll over and dogpile onto the action 'cause its time for Ruff City! Play as Lucky the Dog- punch, kick and spin your way to victory through 4 stages of PUG-ilistic mayhem. Ruff City is a classic beat em' up game featuring local co-op and a pack of fur-ocious bosses to overcome. Grab a friend and take to the streets!
(Controller required for Multiplayer)
